interpretation: The mango card represents abundance and indulgence. Like the fruit itself, this card is juicy and sweet, indicating a time of enjoyment and pleasure. It may signify a new opportunity or a bountiful harvest. The mango card can also suggest a need for balance, as too much of a good thing can lead to overindulgence. It may be a reminder to savor the moment and appreciate the richness of life. Associated keywords include: abundance, pleasure, harvest, indulgence, sweetness, satisfaction, balance, and enjoyment.
